30 #include "omronsentech_camera/stcamera_nodelet.h"
31 
32 namespace stcamera
33 {
34  StCameraNodelet::StCameraNodelet():running_(false)
35  {
36  }
37 
38  StCameraNodelet::~StCameraNodelet()
39  {
40  if (running_)
41  {
42  NODELET_INFO("Shutting down");
43  running_ = false;
44  spinThread_->join();
45  NODELET_INFO("Shutting down complete");
46  }
47  }
48 
49  void StCameraNodelet::onInit()
50  {
51  ros::NodeHandle nh = this->getPrivateNodeHandle();
52  node_.reset(new StCameraNode(nh));
53 
54  running_ = true;
55  spinThread_ = boost::shared_ptr< boost::thread >
56  (new boost::thread(boost::bind(&StCameraNodelet::spinFunc, this)));
57  };
58 
59  void StCameraNodelet::spinFunc()
60  {
61  ros::Rate r(1);
62  while(running_)
63  {
64  node_->spin();
65  r.sleep();
66  }
67  }
68 }
69 PLUGINLIB_EXPORT_CLASS(stcamera::StCameraNodelet, nodelet::Nodelet);
